img_above_text:
![Wukong LowerHollow 55.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/ef/Wukong_LowerHollow_55.jpg)
In this form, he'll start by performing a series of charge attacks after stamping the ground to cause muddy geysers to erupt all around.
img_below_text:
When he begins to charge, you can still sprint out of the way, but you'll need to act fast.
![Wukong LowerHollow 57.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/9/9b/Wukong_LowerHollow_57.jpg)

img_summary: The image depicts a boss battle in *Black Myth: Wukong* against Zhu Bajie, a large, intimidating enemy with glowing red eyes and tusks. The surrounding environment appears to be a muddy, desolate area, consistent with the description of erupting muddy geysers caused by the boss's ground-stamping attacks. The player's health and stamina bars are visible, along with various ability icons, suggesting active combat mechanics. The preceding and following text highlights the need for quick movement to evade Zhu Bajie's charge attacks during this encounter.
